ref_docs.title: Spin-transfer torque magnetoresistive random-access memory technologies for normally off computing (invited)
A new spin on magnetic memories

Magnetoresistive Random Access Memory: Magnetoresistive random access memory (MRAM) and particularly spin-transfer-torque MRAM is a nonvolatile memory with very high endurance and scalability. It is based on an array of magnetic tunnel junctions with magnetoresistive readout of the state of device and uses spin-transfer torque to efficiently rewrite the memory
Computing in Memory with Spin-Transfer Torque Magnetic RAM
